title: Zero-Touch CI/CD Pipeline for Portfolio Website
description: Engineered a complete CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automate the deployment of a static portfolio website. The YAML-based workflow automatically triggers on a git push, building and deploying the site to GitHub Pages, eliminating manual uploads.

alt_text: A diagram showing a web application hosted in Azure App Service.
title: Cloud Web App Hosting with Azure App Service
description: Provisioned a web hosting environment in Microsoft Azure and deployed a static HTML application using Azure App Service. This foundational project demonstrates a practical understanding of cloud application hosting and Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) concepts.

title: End-to-End Customer Churn Prediction Platform
description: Architected and developed a complete data science solution in Microsoft Fabric to analyze and predict customer churn. The project involved the full lifecycle: engineering a star schema data model with PySpark, training and evaluating an XGBoost machine learning model with Python to achieve 79.77% prediction accuracy, and building an interactive Power BI dashboard to visualize the results and identify high-risk customer segments.

alt_text: A diagram of an end-to-end sales analytics pipeline
title: End-to-End Sales Analytics Pipeline
description: Engineered a complete data pipeline using Microsoft Fabric to ingest, clean, transform, and model raw sales data. Architected a star schema data model to enable high-performance reporting in Power BI using DirectLake mode.

alt_text: Architecture diagram of an Azure ETL migration and optimization
title: Azure-Based ETL Migration & Optimization
description: Designed end-to-end ETL pipelines with Azure Data Factory and Databricks. Implemented transformations using PySpark in Azure Databricks to optimize performance, reducing data processing time by 30%.

alt_text: A graphic showing SQL Server optimization and disaster recovery concepts
title: SQL Server Optimization & Monitoring
description: Developed a Python script using pyodbc to automate SQL Server backup monitoring and query performance analysis. Optimized database query performance, achieving an execution time of 0.02 seconds on test data.
